page.title: 18PLAY GROUPS, SHERBORNE.
page.content: { Play groups}in Sherborne are run outside the education system. The play group in Rawson Hall has 28 children who are organized by 3 helpers. The age range is 2 to 5. It is run in school term time 9-12 daily. The children play with educational games but they also do painting, stick _ing, and lego.In the summer they play outside with toys. They also have an annual summer outing. The cost of play group is Â£1 a day which buys toys and books. At 11.15 they have milk or orange and biscuits. Mothers send children to play group either because they are working mothers or so that their chidren can make new friends.
